pageOne.secondValue: JAVA, HTML, JS, CSS, Perl, Eclipse, Git
pageOne.description:
After completing high school, I moved to Munich and studied Electrical and Information Technologies at TUM.


However, I switched to the teaching degree in Computer Science and Physics at LMU because I was more interested in programming and enjoyed working with people.


After two semesters and an internship, I realized that a school environment may not be the right fit for me.

pageOne.secondValue: JAVA, COBOL, BAT, PS, HTML, JS, CSS, Perl, JIRA, Eclipse, Siemens BS2000, Jenkins, Git
pageOne.description:
After completing my studies at the University of Munich, I was trained as an application developer at MÃ¼nchner Verein e.V. The apprentices were taught in blocks at CSS Academy and received training in various programming languages, frameworks, networks and soft skills.


I worked with COBOL on a Siemens BS2000 for two years and developed and maintained full-stack applications with Oracle, JAVA, and web technologies.

pageOne.secondValue: C# .NET, C++, JAVA, BAT, PS, VBScript, JS, HTML/CSS, SQL, MS Teams, Git, MSSQL, Oracle
pageOne.description:
After my apprenticeship and five years in Munich, I moved back to the Bavarian Forest and was hired as a software developer by Megatech Communication GmbH.


I became in my full-stack skills and was responsible for complete systems right from the start.


My first major project was the company's own web shop based on ASP.NET, which I was involved in in relation to on database structures, e-commerce, scripting, server-client architecture, security and web technologies.

pageTwo.description:
After feeling confident in my skills as a developer, I wanted to learn new things and take the opportunity to do project management for some internal projects.


In recent years, I have therefore always been responsible for developing software products for customers.This included the areas of consulting, project planning, development, testing, acceptance and installation.


During this time I learned a lot about customer communication, consulting, project planning, resource planning, product development, version management and much more.

Because I've always enjoyed working with people, I had the opportunity to take on the position of head instructor.


During this time I I hired and supervised more than eight trainees and prepared them for their final exams.


During this time I was able to gain a lot of experience in the areas of personnel management, communication, planning, training and lectures.

pageTwo.secondValue: C# .NET, C++, JAVA, BAT, PS, VBScript, JS, HTML/CSS, SQL
pageTwo.description:
A lot has also happened on the development side during this time. I have familiarized myself with new technologies and have been involved in numerous internal and external projects.


During this time, our team has developed and distributed numerous software products, including a UC client, a wallboard system, an internal ticket and working time management tool, e-commerce applications and much more.


I've learned a lot about Javascript/Typescript, Node.js, Vue.js, Webservices, Microservices, HTML/CSS, Bootstrap, MSSQL, Oracle, MongoDB and also have backend services in C# .NET, Java or Python.

pageThree.secondValue: Solidity, EVM, Remix, web3.js, ether.js, LINK, DOT
pageThree.description:
I first heard about blockchain in 2012 but didn't really get interested in it until 2018. I read a lot, watched videos, studied whitepapers and then became part of a crypto project as Customer service representatives and developers.


There I was able to gain insight into the processes of a decentralized company and learned fluent English.


However, the project had to be financed almost all employees laid off.

pageThree.secondValue: StartUp Management, Leadership, Negotiation, Company Management
pageThree.description:
Last year I founded WenServices with a friend from Denmark and developed a crypto management SaaS product.


I gained experience in people management, Start-up, project management, communication, acquisition, content creation, social media, blockchain development and more.


I developed my own token and solidity-based blockchain website BetWithFriends, wrote bots and built websites using react.js and vue.js.

pageThree.secondValue: Azure, AWS, Linode, Apache, Docker, Kubernetes, CI
pageThree.description:
As a full-stack developer and founder of a start-up, you don't just have to worry about databases and software. You also have to acquire knowledge of networks and hosting.


In order to host our microservices, proxies and websites, I have gained a lot of experience with AWS and its environment. I have also gained a lot of experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Apache and various Linux distributions.


At Megatech I also had the opportunity to gain and implement experience in virtualization with VSphere.

about.description:
Most importantly, I am a loving husband, stepfather of 4 and proud of my life.

For the past six years, I have been employed in the telecommunications industry, serving primarily B2B clients.
Through this role, I have gained valuable experience in communication, product development, and customer acquisition.
Currently, I serve as a Full Stack Developer and Project Manager.

In 2018, I became interested in blockchain technology and have since been enthusiastic about the potential it holds.
I have worked for a cryptocurrency project in the customer service and development departments.

In December of 2021, I founded WenServices, a software company that is developing a SaaS solution for crypto business management in our spare time. Through this venture, I have gained experience in managing start-up challenges, leading a small team, and handling various tasks. Due to the dispersed location of our team members, I have honed my skills in English communication andnegotiation.

Additionally, I have taken courses in Solidity and have completed several projects using the Ethereum blockchain. As a Developer,Project Manager, and founder, I have developed a range of hard and soft skills.

I am proficient in remote work and am committed to delivering exceptional results.
